lead_paragraph: HEALEY--Ann P. Conyers, died on July 16, 2016. She was predeceased by her husband Jack and many members of her immediate family. She will be mourned by her sisters Eileen, Marguerite and Ruth. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Friday, July 22, 2016 at 9:30am in the chapel of Mary Manning Walsh, New York City. Through the Glory of the Resurrection, may Ann be restored to the fullness of life. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HEALEY, ANN P
